programme.title: Bad behaviour in tennis and chivalry in golf
programme.short_synopsis: The rise and fall of bad behaviour in tennis and golf, final refuge of sporting chivalry.
programme.medium_synopsis: The rise and fall of tennis brats from the riot of McEnroe v Nastase, NYC 1979 to McEnroe's forfiet at the 1990 Australian Open and golf as the last refuge of chivalry in sport.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
